definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
abbr. for Israel 以色列[Yi3 se4 lie4]
to use/by means of/according to/in order to/because of/at (a certain date or place)
lit. the other mountain's stone can polish jade (idiom); to improve oneself by accepting criticism from outside/to borrow talent from abroad to develop the nation effectively
pinyin: ta1 shan1 zhi1 shi2 ke3 yi3 gong1 yu4

definition: can be understood, but not described (idiom, from Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子); mysterious and subtle
pinyin: ke3 yi3 yi4 hui4 , bu4 ke3 yan2 chuan2

definition: a summer insect cannot discuss ice (idiom)
pinyin: xia4 chong2 bu4 ke3 yi3 yu3 bing1

definition: a single spark can start a huge blaze (idiom); an insignificant cause can have a massive effect
pinyin: xing1 xing5 zhi1 huo3 , ke3 yi3 liao2 yuan2

sentences.english: They could even count the fruit in Soviet orchards and analyze their crops.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至可以數出蘇聯果園裏的果樹並分析其產量。

sentences.english: The result is, that it is not necessary to use gibberlin acid.
sentences.chinese: 實驗結果是，種子不必經過酸處理也可以發芽。

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Smart software can also reduce medical errors.
sentences.chinese: 高智能的軟體也可以減少醫療疏失。

sentences.english: The positive side effect is, that the seed of Roridula can be stored for many years.
sentences.chinese: 這個特性，可以讓捕蟲樹的種子保存數年。

sentences.english: So is it correct English to split infinitives?
sentences.chinese: 所以我的答案是可以拆分不定式。

sentences.english: And you express that "I'm feeling this way, is it ok?"
sentences.chinese: 你可以表達“我有這樣子的感覺，沒問題吧？”

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時將近結束，大家可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: Build a sub-process that you can use to manage larger business systems.
sentences.chinese: 構建可以用來管理較大業務系統的子流程。

sentences.english: An application that can run statics analysis on sports matches .
sentences.chinese: 一個應用程序可以運行在體育靜力學的研究與分析。

sentences.english: Eg. The house on the hill overlooks the village.
sentences.chinese: 從小山上的房子可以俯視村莊。

sentences.english: Russia says that Iran and North Korea do not have missiles capable of striking Europe.
sentences.chinese: 俄羅斯說，伊朗和北韓沒有掌握可以打擊歐洲的導彈。

sentences.english: Google can shut down its phone manufacturing operations, or sell it off.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌可以關停手機生產部門，或是再次將其出售。

sentences.english: Lemons contain pectin fiber, which assists in fighting hunger cravings.
sentences.chinese: 檸檬富含果膠纖維，它又可以抵抗飢餓。

sentences.english: This class will be over in a moment, now let's take a nap(break , catnap).
sentences.chinese: 本課時快要竣事，各人可以休息一會兒。

sentences.english: And who can argue with Orwell?
sentences.chinese: 誰可以跟奧維爾爭論呢？

definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy
to be capable of/to be able to/can
can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to want to/to feel like/to fancy/to care for sb/desirous of
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
again/once more/re-/second/another/then (after sth, and not until then)/no matter how ... (followed by an adjective or verb, and then (usually) 也[ye3] or 都[dou1] for emphasis)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
